name: At the behest of the Pike: Time To Run
name_original: At the behest of the Pike: Time To Run
description:
The stove can go if there are wheels and firewood!
You have to control a crazy stove and run away from a dangerous saw. And why did the stove have wheels, there is no answer for sure, but maybe the pike wanted it that way

Features of the game:

  • Rhythm-based Action Platforming!
  • Many achievements.
  • Oven with wheels in the winter forest.
  • The furnace runs away from the saw.
  • The oven smokes a lot.
  • It's snowing in the woods.
  • The biggest danger is the saws.

Management:

  • The oven goes automatically.
  • You can accelerate the movement by moving forward.
  • You can jump and slow down in front of obstacles.
